greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = if n <= lpf(n)^2 then lpf(n) else a(lpf(n) + n/lpf(n)), where lpf = least prime factor, A020639.
comment: n>1: a(n) is prime and a(n)=n iff n is prime.
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: lpf[n_] := FactorInteger[n][[1, 1]]; a[n_] := a[n] = If[n <= lpf[n]^2, lpf[n], a[lpf[n] + n/lpf[n]]]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 74}](* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 21 2011 *)
program: a068319 n = if n <= spf ^ 2 then spf else a068319 $ spf + div n spf
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 27 2002, Jul 13 2007
